amendment.description: To provide for the enhanced review of covered pesticide products, to authorize fees for certain pesticide products, and to extend and improve the collection of maintenance fees.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2158 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2158 proposed by Senator Craig to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14496) To provide for the enhanced review of covered pesticide products, to authorize fees for certain pesticide products, and to extend and improve the collection of maintenance fees.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2158 proposed by Senator Craig to Amendment SA 2150.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2158 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
